strapiEvent.name: Backyard Mushroom Growing
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Come out and learn how to grow mushrooms in your own backyard with Palace Mushrooms, a small mushroom farm focused on education and cultivation of local mushroom strains. At Backyard Mushroom Growing, youâ€™ll learn three low tech methods to grow your own oyster, shiitake, and wine cap mushrooms!

Grow kits, spawn, and fresh mushrooms will all be available for purchase after class.

$15/members or $25/nonmembers
